eventName: Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun
storyInfo: When she isn't allowed to borrow an exhibit, Pepe sneaks into the museum at night, placing her gem into the item, only to find it strangely disappears. She is forced to leave when a security guard shows up. The next day, the Nameless General wakes up in the middle of the exhibit.

attributes.content: ♪Night blankets the riverbanks♪
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: ♪Twin moons rise in loving embrace♪
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: ♪In the dark they kiss♪
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: ♪Then the stars illuminate♪
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: ♪And they blush in their glow♪
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: You gave me a fright, girl! What are you doing here in the middle of the night?
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: Scared I'm gonna rob you?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Of course not. It's only rich folks around here.
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: Shouldn't a girl your age be on a date down at Riverside Avenue at this hour? What are you doing in front of the museum?
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: I'm on the night shift.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Ugh, the youth these days! My lamps used to shine on young couples in the throes of passion, but now you're all doing overtime at ungodly hours.
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: Go on, I've lit your path. Have a safe trip home when you get off.
attributes.name: Lamplighter

attributes.content: Thanks for that!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: There really is no one here... guess Titi wasn't messing with me.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Let's see if they've picked up anything new.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Gem workshop artifacts from the Age of Shadow. Hmm... The Originium circuits on this one is really something... assembled from multiple pieces?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: No, it was crafted out of a single piece of Originium. Amazing work. Really have to look close to see it.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Wow, ritual instruments from the Age of Flow, found in the jungles. Are those blood spots from ritual sacrifices?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: And all these weapons... A ceremony from the Battle of Turbah Al-Sawda?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Well, I'll get to know you later. I have an appointment to keep.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: It's here...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Nice to meet you, old man! Sorry for disturbing your peace and quiet tonight, but I have questions that only you can answer.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Please don't get mad at me.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Wow, amazing!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Feline, approximately two meters tall. Most of the body has been replaced with mechanical parts, integrated with the remaining biological tissue.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Skin color is purple, likely from the preservative fluids used, and it remains supple to the touch.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: A golden mask and a suit of golden armor. All internal organs have been removed.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Strange. Neither the mummy nor the funerary objects give any clue to the location of the trove.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: But everything from the site is here.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Perhaps it's the gem itself that offers a hint...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: 'First, the heart. At its first beat, we come to be.'
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: 'Second, the lungs. At their first breath, we come to feel.'
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: 'Third, the bowels. We fill them with food, cultivate our tongues, and develop our own likings.'
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: 'Fourth, the liver. We go into the night, awake and alert, for duty and obligation.'
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Now how do I use this gem?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe ponders for a while, then reaches into the mummy's chest cavity, placing the gem where the heart should be.
She holds her breath, waiting for something to happen.
Nothing?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: No change at all...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: No images or text appear. Pepe frowns and tries to retrieve the gem.
Perhaps she simply placed it wrong.
But as soon as she reaches into the chest cavity, she senses that something is off.
There should be an empty space, but it feels like she's put her hand into water. The gem is right there before her eyes, but she feels like she's groping in a bottomless pond.
Huh...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Who goes there? Have you any idea what time it is?
Oh no, it's security.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe closes the glass display case lightly, and sneaks into the darkness, holding her breath.
Who's there?
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: I thought I heard something.
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: Was it over here?
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: (Don't come this way, no!)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Hey, is someone there?
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: (Yikes! He's right behind me...)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Who is it?!
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: (There's someone else?)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Meow?
attributes.name: Mysterious Animal

attributes.content: Oh, just a little critter. How did you get in here, cutie?
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: Meow!
attributes.name: Mysterious Animal

attributes.content: Hey, don't run! Look, I have a can of fins in oil!
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: (I need to get the gem...)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Where did it go? I just turned a corner and it's gone?
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: (Why are you coming back?!)
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Did the last shift forget to shut the windows? Hot air's blowing in.
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: I guess that explains the critter. Can't let it run around the museum.
attributes.name: Museum Security

attributes.content: Mroaw—!
attributes.name: Mysterious Animal

attributes.content: Mroaaaw—!
attributes.name: Mysterious Animal

attributes.content: I don't care whose pet you are, one more sound from you and I'll have you castrated tomorrow!
attributes.name: Angry Woman

attributes.content: (Softly) Meow...?
attributes.name: Mysterious Animal

attributes.content: *yawn* Sorry, Mio, I was fast asleep and didn't hear you outside.
attributes.name: Slumbering Citizen

attributes.content: (Shakes tail irritably)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Did you see that one?
attributes.name: Slumbering Citizen

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Good work, Mio.
attributes.name: Slumbering Citizen

attributes.content: We've waited for so long.
attributes.name: Slumbering Citizen

attributes.content: Bring him to me as soon as you can.
attributes.name: Slumbering Citizen

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Come, I have some jerky for you.
attributes.name: Slumbering Citizen

attributes.content: (Nudges with affection)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Pepe...
What were you doing last night?
Come now... You have to tell me...
I-It wasn't me! I didn't do it! I stayed in the whole night! Whatever it is, I didn't do it!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe...?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Anat...?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Pepe, did you... sleep last night?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Why do you ask? I feel fine.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: You fell asleep in the middle of a conversation...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: *yawn*... Morning, ladies.
You reek of alcohol, Titi. Where were you last night?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: I took Pepe out on the town. Not like she's in town every day, after all.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: How did you even wake up after drinking so much yesterday? And not one whiff of booze on you? Did you shower?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Oh... yeah! My brain was all foggy, so I took a cold shower.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: The opening ceremony is today, Titi.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: And you took Pepe out drinking??? Don't I have enough to worry about already?!
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Hey, I came first thing in the morning. I've looked at all the details of the exhibition. Your arrangements are perfect, except...
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Is something not good enough? Just tell me, while we still have a chance to make changes.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: You're too high strung today. Settle down.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Just focus on your speech. Leave this to me, and I guarantee your exhibition will go smoothly.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: *sigh* Get changed before you make any promise to me. The guests will complain if they smell all that liquor on you.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: (Whisper) That look on your face. What trouble did you get yourself into? Explain.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: (Whisper) I tried putting that gem into the mummy's chest cavity last night. I was about to retrieve it when a security guard showed up.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Whisper) Get me a bit of time alone with the mummy once the exhibition is over. I'll take the gem back.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Whisper) Thankfully, no one has noticed anything wrong. You'll have an hour, at most. If you still can't get it out, I'll have to report that my pass got stolen.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: (Whisper) Don't worry, if I can't get it out, I'll apologize to Anat my self.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Whisper) How did you get that smell onto you anyway?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: (Whisper) I poured a bottle of wine on myself before I came in.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Explains why you're all sticky.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: How are preparations going over there, Ajani?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: No problem, Narantuya. The smoke emitter is set, and we'll have our commotion on your signal.
attributes.name: Right Earphone

attributes.content: Your status, Ajazi?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'm in position.
attributes.name: Left Earphone

attributes.content: Good. She's a Padishah's daughter, and there will be big trouble if we don't make this a clean kidnapping.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I don't understand why you insist on doing it here with all these visitors around.
attributes.name: Left Earphone

attributes.content: The more people, the better.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: When the commotion happens, no one will bat an eye at a few compassionate souls carrying a poor fainted girl out of the room.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: They'll be too busy worrying about themselves.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I marked the camera blind spots on your map. Pick the right time to knock her out.
attributes.name: Right Earphone

attributes.content: Right, I'll leave early to set an ambush.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Hopefully this needle will give her a good dream. I don't want to have to go into the jungle to make this serum again.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I can't read the hieroglyphs on the sign... excuse me. Do you know how to get to the 'Northeastern Tributary' exhibit?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: The Northeastern Tributary exhibit, huh...? I'm not sure. I've never been there.
attributes.name: Picky Visitor

attributes.content: We could look for it together, if you don't mind. I find the lines of your muscles more beautiful than anything on display here.
attributes.name: Picky Visitor

attributes.content: Please don't say that. Everything exhibited here is a piece of history.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: All these artifacts are worth stopping to admire.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: You could have just said you weren't interested and spared me the excuses.
attributes.name: Picky Visitor

attributes.content: Excuse me. Do you know where the Northeastern Tributary exhibit is?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Let's see... take a right there, walk five hundred meters, then take a left.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Thank you. I've asked quite a few people, but none of them knew where it was.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I understand. The citizens here are proud of Sargon's long history, but they don't care much about faraway places.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: You should have seen when the Columbian history exhibit was running. So quiet you could hear a pin drop.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Yes... I can sense the arrogance.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Thank you for showing me the way.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Respect... that's what modern people lack.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: Wait, how did I end up in this hall again? I should try the right side this time.
attributes.name: Wandering Staff

attributes.content: There are more visitors than I expected.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I'm a little worried about Anat. She's fidgeting so much she's going to tear her speech to shreds.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Can't be any worse than her first presentation. It took hours for her to come back to her senses that time.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Hey, where are you going?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Just to have a little chat with her, get her to relax.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: How are the preparations going, Anat?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I can already recite this speech backwards from memory, but the moment I think about all those eyes fixed on me, listening to every word I say...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: What will they think if I stutter, or make a mistake?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: They'll all forget by dinner.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: The Flood Festival is right around the corner. Who has room to remember one girl's embarrassment during all those festivities?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: But I'm nervo—hey, why are you rubbing my ears?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Feel better now?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Works every time. I still remember how Pepe and I rubbed your ears like this for an entire day to get you to relax before an interview.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: ...Thank you, Titi. Very thoughtful.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Bayanlar ve Baylar, take your seats, and welcome Curator Anat El-Aydin onto the stage with a round of warm applause!
attributes.name: MC

attributes.content: Go. It's alright if you make a mistake, just keep going.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: If you're so stiff, I'll sneak around behind your back and rub your ears. Better to be embarrassed together than alone, right?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Oh, Titi...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Welcome to the Varjavandabad Museum's special exhibit, commemorating the Flood Festival.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: The highlight of the exhibit is an unnamed man, discovered in the Fourth Necropolis Complex on the outskirts of the city, meeting the public for the first time.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Both the body, the armor and the funerary objects buried with him are remarkably well-preserved.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: The extraordinary details on his clothing is clear indication of high status.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: It has been dated to the early days of the New Calendar according to the Aslan dating method, making him a contemporary of Lugalszargus, the 'Shah of Past and Future'.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: He has not been identified in any extant Sargonian historical records. Based on the artifacts recovered from his tomb, we theorize that he may have been...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Excuse me, is this the Northeastern Tributary exhibit?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Did I take a wrong turn?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Yes... the Northeastern Tributary exhibit is on the other side of the museum, near the entrance.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Sorry to interrupt.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: ...It's fine.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Ahem... in any case... Continuing where we left off...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: We have theorized that the mummy is...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Ouch!
attributes.name: Man in Pain

attributes.content: Excuse me, sir! Sorry!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Are you blind?!
attributes.name: Man in Pain

attributes.content: Honored guests...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: My fault! Sorry, sir!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Excuse me, hanimefendi... where are you going?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Urgent business! Please carry on speaking!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: But I'm just reaching...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Alright, yes! I know, I'm getting out right now.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...the most important part of the presentation.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Er... where was I...?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Sorry... let me find my place...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Oh, yes... the exhibit behind me...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: I-It's...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: *yawn*
attributes.name: Voice in the Crowd

attributes.content: What is she talking about? I'm getting sleepy...
attributes.name: Voice in the Crowd

attributes.content: It's...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Anat spent a long time preparing for this speech.
She prepared for bored audience members to leave, or heckle her for her mistakes.
But she never imagined she would lose her train of thought because an interruption, leaving her speechless.
She tries to collect herself, taking a few deep breaths, forcing a smile toward the crowd. She attempts to continue.
Then she feels a hand on her ear, pressing it gently.
Anat blinks, feeling a sense of warmth rise in her heart.
Thanks, Titi. I'm fine, don't wor—
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Anat does not finish the sentence.
She sees Titi looking up at her from the crowd in terror. Pepe's jaw has dropped open so wide that it could fit a whole apple.
If Titi is not behind her, then whose hand is on her ear?
Anat gulps. She dares not turn around.
